name: Spooky Castle - Demo
description:
Battle your way through dark rooms and narrow  hallways of monsters. With your trusty shotgun by your side, you must find a way to escape the castle alive. Will you escape and live to tell the tale or die like the ones before you???

*DISCLAIMER* This build does not represent the final build. Some assets are placeholder assets and will not be present in the final game. 

Spooky Castle is a retro first person shooter prototype I constructed in the Unity Engine, The game is a reference to older shooter's like Wolfenstein 3D and Doom.

You Can Follow My Game Development Progress At - Twitter
